enforcedSoftwareUpdateNonOSDeferredInsta.title: enforcedSoftwareUpdateNonOSDeferredInstallDelay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateNonOSDeferredInsta.description: This restriction allows the admin to set how many days to delay an app software update on the device. When this restriction is in place the user sees a non-OS software update only after the specified delay after the release of the software. This value controls the delay for forceDelayedAppSoftwareUpdates. Default 30 maximum 90.

enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay.title: enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay.description: Sets how many days to delay a software update on the device. With this restriction in place, the user doesn't see a software update until the specified number of days after the software update release date. This value is used by forceDelayedAppSoftwareUpdates and forceDelayedSoftwareUpdates. 90 max.

enforcedSoftwareUpdateMajorOSDeferredIns.title: enforcedSoftwareUpdateMajorOSDeferredInstallDelay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateMajorOSDeferredIns.description: This restriction allows the admin to set how many days to delay a major software update on the device. When this restriction is in place the user sees a software update only after the specified delay after the release of the software update. This value controls the delay for forceDelayedMajorSoftwareUpdates. Default 30. Max 90
